title: Scrooge A Christmas Carol - Alastair Sim Fantasy 1951
description:
Plot.
The best adaptation of Charles Dickens A Christmas Carol of all time, 
originally called Scrooge. Ebenezer Scrooge is a greedy businessman who thinks 
only of making money. For him, Christmas is, in his own words, a humbug. It 
has been seven years since his friend and partner, Jacob Marley, died and on 
Christmas Eve. Marley'stells him he is to be visited during the night 
by three spirits. Theof Christmas Past revisits some of the main events 
in Scrooge's life to date, including his unhappy childhood, his happy 
apprenticeship to Mr. Fezziwig who cared for his employees, and the end of his 
engagement to a pretty young woman due to growing love of money. Theof 
Christmas Present shows him how joyously is nephew Fred and his clerk, Bob 
Cratchit, celebrate Christmas with those they love. Theof Christmas Yet 
to Come shows him what he will leave behind after he is gone. Scrooge awakens 
on Christmas morning, a new man intent on doing good and celebrating the 
season with all of those around him.

Stars.
=>-Alastair Sim : Ebenezer Scrooge.
=>-Kathleen Harrison : Mrs. Dilber.
=>-Mervyn Johns : Bob Cratchit.
=>-Hermione Baddeley : Mrs. Cratchit.
=>-Michael Hordern : Jacob Marley.
=>-Glyn Dearman : Tiny Tim.

Director.
=>-Brian Desmond Hurst.
